subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Oakland released running back Dominic Rhodes, two days after using its top draft pick to take Darren McFadden. Oakland had a glut at running back after the draft, with LaMont Jordan, Justin Fargas and Michael Bush.
snippet: Oakland released running back Dominic Rhodes, two days after using its top draft pick to take Darren McFadden. Oakland had a glut at running back after the draft, with LaMont Jordan, Justin Fargas and Michael Bush.
